items.title: Cargo Pants
items.description: Cargo pants are a combination of jeans and dress pants. They have lots of pockets too!

items.title: Dress Pants
items.description: Our dress pants are perfect for events where you need to look your best.

items.title: Jeans
items.description: Our jeans have all the comfort of sweatpants, but they look a lot better!

items.title: SweatPants
items.description: Going to the gym? Class? Work? Our sweatpants can handle whatever you throw at them.
